CREATE TABLE {TableName} (
    "LogNo" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Acknowledge" character varying(1) NULL,
    "ApplicationID" character varying(36) NULL,
    "CreatedAt" timestamp without time zone NULL,
    "Flow" character varying(1) NULL,
    "Format" character varying(1) NULL,
    "GlobalID" character varying(50) NULL,
    "Level" character varying(1) NULL,
    "Message" character varying(8000) NULL,
    "ProgramName" character varying(50) NULL,
    "ProjectID" character varying(36) NULL,
    "Properties" character varying(8000) NULL,
    "RunningEnvironment" character varying(1) NULL,
    "ServerID" character varying(30) NULL,
    "ServiceID" character varying(36) NULL,
    "TransactionID" character varying(36) NULL,
    "Type" character varying(1) NULL,
    "UserID" character varying(36) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_{TableName}" PRIMARY KEY ("LogNo")
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."LogNo" IS '로그순번';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Acknowledge" IS '거래구분';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."ApplicationID" IS '어플리케이션ID';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."CreatedAt" IS '입력일시';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Flow" IS '업무흐름';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Format" IS '데이터포맷';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."GlobalID" IS '거래고유ID';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Level" IS '업무수준';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Message" IS '로그메시지';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."ProgramName" IS '프로그램';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."ProjectID" IS '프로젝트ID';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Properties" IS '추가속성';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."RunningEnvironment" IS '실행환경';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."ServerID" IS '서버ID';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."ServiceID" IS '서비스ID';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."TransactionID" IS '거래ID';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."Type" IS '업무구분';
COMMENT ON COLUMN {TableName}."UserID" IS '입력자ID';

CREATE INDEX IX_{TableName}_GlobalID
ON {TableName} (GlobalID);

CREATE INDEX IX_{TableName}_CreatedAt
ON {TableName} (CreatedAt DESC);
